attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since Margaret Thatcher was our PM i have been writing to all PMs about the KNIFE culture,and sensless murders,and how if something wasn't done then it would spirral out of control,and it has but now we have the GUN violence,we are basically living in a lawless country,sentences are way to lenient,and the prisons are like hotels, take a look at the USA justice system,prison should be prison, harsher sentences will act as a detterent

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
